title: Saving Issue - Primary Edit Text doesn't save
label: [Label(name="bug"), Label(name="cannot replicate"), Label(name="help wanted")]
body:
User is seeing an issue where non-list item text fields are not updating on save. 

> it only saves secondary aspects (Not High Concept or Trouble). It also does not save character names or descriptions

This is particularly odd as they follow the same update logic, and have fewer intermediaries so I would expect these fields to be more reliable.

title: Saving Issue - Click twice to save
label: [Label(name="bug"), Label(name="cannot replicate"), Label(name="help wanted")]
body:
Another report of an issue with saving. 

> Appears to require save button twice to track changes

I suspect this may be due to the text watchers firing after the save serialises the character object. 

*Solution*: Clear the focus before saving and add a second delay to the save button firing.

title: Add Sort to Skills List
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:

Being about to sort the skills would make this a lot easier.

* Alphabetic (description) ascending
* Numeric (value) descending

Have a toggle button in the Skills header that swaps between sort alpha and sort number icons.

title: Fix Adaptive-Icon Compat.
body:
Issue fix explanation: 

> Adaptive Icons were introduced in Android O API 26, though because the
file is in mipmap-anydpi, Android favors it over the other
resources. This causes issues on API 25 and below. By changing the
folder name from `mipmap-anydpi` to `mipmap-anydpi-v26` the icon will
only be selected on API 26 and above.

label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
There should be a dice roller in the application. 

Ideally the dice roller should have the following:

- [x] Display results of each die
- [ ] Show a record of `x` previous rolls
- [x] Display the Fate ladder result
- [x] Accessible from any screen on a character sheet
- [x] Ability to see any modifiers while using the dice roller (e.g. If I'm rolling for Stealth I should be able to see stealth skill)
